CHAT.comment: CHI is looking into the viewfinder of his parents' camcorder

u.a: CHI drops a remote controller which has been sitting next to the camcorder on the cabinet
pointing at one of the videos
takes a pair of scissors from the cabinet
CHI is waiving th scissors in front of MIT's face
looks at MIT and points at one of the chairs
a piece of paper with a picture of a dog
hops on a toy fire engine
pushing around CHI and the fire engine

CHAT.comment: MIT has a new train-shaped book. The book has a long fold-in page with pictures and flaps

u.a: trying to open a door without a flap
sees an aligator under a flap

CHAT.comment: CHI and MIT are looking at more stuff on the cabinet

u.a: turns over a bucket filled with plastic foam letters
puts the bucket on his head
puts the bucket on MIT's head
throws the letter in the trash can
shows one that is in good shape
puts the letter in the frame
the letter doesn't match the frame
throws the letter in the trash can
the frame has the shape of a train
takes the train away and puts it in a bucket across the living room
runs to the cabinet and looks at his video collection
takes a book out of the cabinet
takes the book from MIT and puts it back
gives MIT the cover of the book
the cover came off as CHI tried to put the book back in
takes a coloring book and goes to the drawing desk
there is a cut-here line on the page
applies the scissors to the line, but cannot cut the paper
starts coloring one of the fruits on the tree
there is a fifth fruit left uncolored
points at the circle CHI is coloring orange
draws a circle with his finger
gives the crayon back to MIT
adds Ampamman's features to the circle
the eyes seem to be too small
adds a few lines to MIT's drawing
